attributes.action: Debate the detrimental effects of invoking Article 50 of the Treaty of Lisbon.
attributes.background: Members of Parliament must take note of the referendum result but are not legally bound to abide by it. A majority of MPs in the House wish to remain in Europe so to vote for the invoking of Article 50 would be going against their beliefs.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
